effect: If the Pokémon is not holding an item, it will retrieve the first Poké Ball that fails to catch a wild Pokémon in battle.
synergies: Pokémon that frequently switch in and out
Teams using many single-use balls like Quick Balls or Dusk Balls
notes: Only works once per battle; exclusive to Yamper and Boltund; retrieved ball goes to the Pokémon's held item slot.
